definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to set off/to take to the road
to clean the street/to clear the road (i.e. get rid of people for passage of royalty or VIP)
to report back to one's superior
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
sir (respectful form of address for an old man)
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
